name: Necrohazard
description:
Arrow Keys or WASD to move, mouse to aim, left mouse button to shoot

When you kill skeletons, they release a ghost and drop a charge. Collect 3 charges to activate your laser, use your laser to kill ghosts

Press m to toggle the sound between static off, silent, and full volume

---

This is still a work in progress, I still want to add some bosses and maybe collaborate with a musician on a soundtrack, but otherwise I'm feeling pretty happy about it
